package.name: DB_DataContainer
package.description: Provides persistence layer for object data to be stored in PEAR DB supported databases. Included common methods for saving, retrieving and deleting data with automatic query generation. Multiobject retrieving supported with static function call. Runtime generation of accessor methods supported with recent PHP. generation.

release.notes: * Overloaded accessor methods are now handled more intelligently.
* Support for autogenerating accessor methods in runtime added.
* First release candidate. * Uses DB::autoExecute() instead of internally building the queries. * Tested to work with Postgres and MySQL
